title: President Donald J. Trump Will Always Support America’s Farmers – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
May 23, 2019
On every front, we are fighting for our great farmers, our ranchers, our growers.
						President Donald J. Trump					DEFENDING AMERICAN FARMERS: President Donald J. Trump is defending American farmers from unjustified trade retaliation.  EXPANDING AGRICULTURAL EXPORTS: President Trump is negotiating fair, free, and reciprocal trade deals that remove barriers and open up markets for American farmers.PRODUCING RESULTS FOR FARMERS: President Trump and his Administration are working every day to deliver for American farmers.
